entry.source: A former politician is trying to take back{F801}his authority and place of power from the{F801}Ashura-kai by selling out the citizens{F801}of Tokyo to a demon. He's formed some sort{F801}of cult! Stop him in the Metropolitan{F801}Government Office before he can summon{F801}the demon and make a contract!{F801}
